title: King George III
subtle:
Biography (nonfiction), 1,311 words, Level X (Grade 5), Lexile 950L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     R and Z2
description: This interesting biography of King George III takes readers through seminal moments in the monarch's life, including the revolution by the American colonies and his eventual madness.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
